subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0262_01C9D955.1D9B14C0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Like I know if I speak into my mic, my voice will get recorded. I have no c=
lue exactly how that works, the inner workings and such that go on to make =
that happen. I just know it does.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
April Abercrombie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20=
, 2009 2:05 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.





  =EF=
=BB=BF 

  "Probably not "directly", since that would mean grandma would ha=
ve to have quite an understanding of digital encoding, including which bits=
 mean what, when, and where."

  Not necessarily-maybe it is that just by t=
rying to communicate through our equipment, it happens automatically. They =
don't have to realize that they are manipulating the EMF to make it occur, =
it just happens. It's the nature of being of pure energy.

    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
    From: Rj 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: =
Wednesday, May 20, 2009 1:55 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a que=
stion.



          Probably not "directly", since that would mean grandma =
would have to have quite an understanding of digital encoding, including wh=
ich bits mean what, when, and where.  But even on a digital recorder, there=
 is still an analog element (the Analog to Digital converter) which takes t=
he sound pressure waves, as represented by some analog electronic detection=
 element, and converts that into digital.  That way, long departed uncle Eb=
enezer does not need to do anything digital.  Under this scenario, if sound=
 is not being heard in the room, but is being induced into the circuitry, t=
hen it would be round about that AtoD converter (assuming it isn't other ju=
st plain old noise in the digital elements).  

          Someone with more=
 electronic know-how than me might be able to better pinpoint the area in t=
he analog portion of that AtoD pipeline where it would be most likely it co=
uld be influenced by, say, an EM field, and that would also occur in a norm=
al analog tape recorder.

           
          --- On Wed, 5/20/09, April =
Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:


            From:=
 April Abercrombie <april@...>
            Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com
            Date: Wednesday, May 20, 2009, 12:29 PM



            This=
 is what I think true EVP is Eric. Not and actual sound emitting a sound wa=
ve in the environment, but EMF manipulation in order to imprint the message=
 directly to the recording media. It doesn't matter if it is analog or digi=
tal.

            If the sound that is recorded emitted a sound wave in the=
 physical environment, then it is really a disembodied voice, and not true =
EVP.

              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Eric =
VanDuzer 
              To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
              Sent: W=
ednesday, May 20, 2009 11:16 AM
              Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I =
have a question.


              Actually that I would buy into  But the qu=
estion I have when you say "tape" are you talking old analog tape or digi r=
ecording.  Here is the reason I believe it can be do "real-time".  As you a=
ll know we use electromagnetic Field detectors in field investigations.  If=
 a spirit can manipulate that with to show that they are there by giving of=
f a EM field whose to say they can't manipulate a magnetic strip of a tape =
or even the electronics in a Digi recorder to speak in "real-time".



    =
          On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 1:01 PM, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@sbcgl=
oba l.net> wrote:





                Okay I have another one for you to t=
hink about.. I tape a session and review it later..  even a day later.  Upo=
n review the message that comes over is about something that =E2=80=98just =
happened=E2=80=99 while I was reviewing or happened after taping?  Is it po=
ssible that spirit can manipulate the recording AFTER recording has stopped=
 or even manipulate the audio while reviewing?



                An give y=
ou an example of this I was recording one day and I reviewed the audio the =
next day.  While reviewing =E2=80=93 about half way through =E2=80=93 the m=
essage =E2=80=9CYour mother is calling=E2=80=9D was found.  I saved it and =
moved on and within two seconds my mom called.  You say it is a coincidence=
 except that I hadn=E2=80=99t spoken to my mother in over a year.  During t=
his same conversation with her =E2=80=93 we sorta made amends and I told he=
r the story of the =E2=80=98secret=E2=80=99 I had found out about a family =
member having a child out of wedlock in the late 1920s.  Quick backstory.. =
I found out about this out-of-wedlock birth through my genealogy research a=
nd contacted spirit through the box and I was promptly told to keep it secr=
et and which I promised to do=E2=80=A6



                Well in this conv=
ersation with my mom after not speaking for a year I told her what I had fo=
und out.  When the telephone conversation ended with my mom=E2=80=A6 I was =
amazed that the recording had told me she would call right be fore she did =
=E2=80=93 even though the audio was recorded the previous day.  I proceeded=
 to go back to reviewing the audio and the very first thing I heard was:  T=
HAT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A SECRET =E2=80=93 YOU LIED.



                Mayb=
e they can manipulate =E2=80=98real-time=E2=80=99 literally??? ?



       =
         k




------------------------------------------------------------=
----

                From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups .com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
                Sent: Wednesday,=
 May 20, 2009 11:36 AM 


                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

   =
             Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.









       =
         2 different things happening-that' s why. When you get EVP that ev=
eryone understands,  it is outward, in the environment. Not a communication=
 through subconscious means.



                EVP that people swear they =
hear, but noone else can make sense, may be a message to them via subconsci=
ous means. That isn't to say that ALL EVP's like this are true messages, I =
am sure alot are just matrixing.



                But then that is how th=
e art of scrying starts-matrixing. Like the Rorschach tests. The images you=
 matrix with those gives the psychologist an insight into your mind.



   =
             By gazing into a dark, reflective surface, you start to see cl=
oudy images. At first, you will just be matrixing faces in the clouds and n=
ot getting much substance. Try it, you will see what I am saying. With prac=
tice, you start to see clear, concise images.



                I think th=
at is what happening with audio as well.



                We already know=
 for a fact pareidolia can occur in audio as well as visual stimulus.



  =
                ----- Original Message ----- 

                  From: Eric=
 VanDuzer 

                  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

              =
    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:19 AM

                  Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



                  yes I understand its =
personal to that particular individual but why can't I hear it.  I have got=
ten some very personal EVPs through the traditional investigation way (not =
through a box or anything of that matter) that all others have heard.

    =
              On Wed, May 20, 2009 at 12:15 PM, April Abercrombie <april@ab=
ercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:



                  "If one person is=
 not meant to hear it they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to b=
elieve that one right yet)." 



                  I don't know for sure ab=
out that one either, but I am not ready to discount it either, especially s=
ince I stumbled across the possibility of audible scrying. But I am sure al=
ot of people don't believe in scrying at all either.



                  W=
hat makes it a possibility to me is that so many people are hearing things =
that are very personal, but stuff they would not have come up with on their=
 own.





                    ----- Original Message ----- 

             =
       From: Eric VanDuzer 

                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .c=
om 

                    Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 10:09 AM

          =
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.



                =
    I think that is the problem I am having though Jim.  When you say "work=
 them over till you hear them"  to me I should not have to work them over t=
ill I hear them.  Yes taking out the ambient and background noise is one th=
ing.  But if you just keep on listening to them with different enhancements=
 you are bound to hear something (matrixing).  If one person is not meant t=
o hear it they won't hear it (I guess I am not quite ready to believe that =
one right yet).  I think you all know what I am getting at.  

            =
        On Tue, May 19, 2009 at 9:11 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@yahoo=
. com> wrote:



                    Well, for myself...I don't "clean" the=
m up to much because I really don't know HOW :) (well a little bit)Since I'=
ve only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT if you can clean up something to=
 where you can FIND what was there to begin with "you have done no harm" I =
hear alot more than others I guess, and I haven't enhanced many of my evp's=
.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I DO promise you will hear what I sa=
y is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if you are able to clean it up with=
 better software (please do for others too) I will be more than happy to "l=
isten" where I made a mistake...I can only LEARN from it :) I have done som=
e DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's...from the begining I could only h=
ear clicks and thumps.....but after messing with that area, eventually I wo=
uld hear the true voices (and can tell if male or female...approximat e age=
) and understand the mood also....these where extreamly modified, and I fee=
l that I could NOT have added enough "simple" enhancements that would ADD a=
 voice....full of emotion and distinct syllables :) And some just can't hea=
r them for what ever reason be it equipment that is used to hear (pc-headph=
ones- speakers- ears) know one has the perfect match of all these things. C=
heck out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files section....work them over till =
you hear them. I really can't do much more :)--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .co=
m, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@.. .> wrote:
                    >
            =
        > Now I may be biased to the "investigation" way of doing things. I=
 do clean
                    > up evps if I hear something and can't make =
it out do to ambient noise. So
                    > hear is my question. W=
hen do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
                    > enhanci=
ng "taint" the results? To me the more enhancing you do the less
          =
          > convincing it becomes. I hope noone finds this offensive, it is=
 not meant
                    > to be I am just really curious. The way I =
look at it is that if you have to
                    > do so much enhancin=
g to find anything, was there really something there to
                   =
 > begin with. Are we just making ourselves believe there is something ther=
e??
                    > 
                    > Eric
                    >=
